title.rendered: Dylan Ferrara Wins Beyond the Peaks Student Film Festival

content.rendered: Congratulations to Dylan Ferrara, the first-place winner of the Beyond the Peaks Student Film Festival! His film will be broadcast on June 28 on Mountain Lake PBS. His amazing production was created in his Digital Video class, and we are so proud of his hard work!  Click here to watch his award-winning film, Memory.
